subject: Wimbledon Tennis Tournament
Tennis
lead_paragraph: Andy Roddick, a three-time finalist at Wimbledon, is the veteran player with sentimentalists on his side. He is well aware of it but still not entirely sure what to make of it.
snippet: Andy Roddick, a three-time finalist at Wimbledon, is the veteran player with sentimentalists on his side. He is well aware of it but still not entirely sure what to make of it.
